title.rendered: How much does Minecraft cost?  – CHIP

content.rendered:
Many users wonder how much Minecraft actually costs. We show you on which platforms and at what prices you can get the game.

Minecraft: What is the cost?

The cost of Minecraft RPG varies from platform to platform. We present the game prices for the respective systems.

  • Minecraft has been available for the most common platforms for a long time now. If you purchase the game, you can use it to its full extent on the respective system without a time limit.
  • If you would like to play Minecraft on a PC or laptop, you can buy the JAVA Edition for a one-time fee of 23.95 euros.
  • If you use the Linux operating system, you pay a little more for the license. The costs here are 26.95 euros.
  • As a Playstation user, you can purchase Minecraft from either the Playstation Store or Amazon. The game is available for both Playstation 3 and Playstation 4 and costs between 30 and 35 euros. You only pay 18.99 euros in the Playstation Store. The game is available for the Playstation Vita for EUR 27.92.
  • As an Xbox user, you can also play Minecraft. For between 30 and 45 euros you can buy the game for the Xbox 360 and for the Xbox One on Amazon. You can get it in the store for 29.99 euros or simply in the game pass for 19.99 euros per month.
  • If you are a Nintendo fan, you can enjoy the gaming experience on the Switch, Wii U and New 3DS models. Depending on the model, you can buy it for between 30 and 45 euros.
  • The cheapest way to play Minecraft is on mobile devices with Android or iOS operating systems. You can get it for just €7.99 on Google Play and the Apple Store.

Video tip: Minecraft – Pocket Edition for iPhone and Android

Initially, the game was only available for PC. You can read about the success story of Minecraft in another practical tip.

(Tip originally written by: Tim Aschermann)
